alert.note: Alert for Carbon; Monroe (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 11 at 6:54AM EST until December 11 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches expected across the Pocono Plateau, with locally higher amounts up to 5 inches possible above 1,800 feet elevation. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Carbon and Monroe. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will taper off after daybreak, however roads will remain slippery until road temperatures warm above freezing later this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
